about.title: About the Project
about.description1: This is a course project developed as part of web development practice. It focuses on working with external APIs, background data synchronization, SPA architecture, and user interaction through a simple interface.
about.description2: The application loads cryptocurrency data from the CoinGecko API, saves it to a local database, and updates it automatically every 10 minutes using Laravel's scheduler.
about.description3: The converter allows quick value conversion between cryptocurrencies based on the latest available prices.
